Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by St. Louis in 1988...
Injured on 9/5/1988 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Cincinnati on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
Had first career hit on 9/18/1993, off Luis Aquino (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1994, off Robb Nen (PIT)...
